title: Court nullifies Edo govt’s revocation of Ize-Iyamu’s land
description: By Ozioruva Aliu BENIN CITY—A Benin High Court presided over by Justice Peter Akhihiero, has nullified the revocation of the Certificate of Occupancy (C of O) of parcels of land at Amagba village in Oredo Local Government Area, belonging to Pastor Osagie Ize-…
content:
